sentences.en: After the operation , on 4,8, 12 wtime - point X - ray photos, ECT, bone density measurement , histology research and hematology inspecting were brought into respectively.

sentences.en: Compasses one of main fields an issue is industrial histology research.
sentences.cn: 规制问题是产业组织学研究的重要领域之一.

sentences.en: He was also partly responsible for the identification of the polio virus, and made numerous contributions to immunology, histology and anatomy.
sentences.cn: 同时，他还参与了脊髓灰质炎病毒的鉴定，在免疫学、组织学和解剖学上都有贡献。

sentences.en: Herein we assessed the association between proteinuria, graft histology and survival.
sentences.cn: 在这里我们评估了蛋白尿症, 移植肾的组织病变以及其存活的关系.

sentences.en: Histology and embryology is an important course of basic medical sciences.
sentences.cn: 组织学与胚胎学是一门重要的医学基础主干课程.

sentences.en: Histology heterogeneity overlaps with other vascular malformations.
sentences.cn: 部分组织病理学具有与其它血管畸形重叠的特点.

sentences.en: Histology involves looking at cells under a microscope.
sentences.cn: 组织学研究包括在显微镜下观察细胞.

sentences.en: HUMAN . EMBRYOLOGY. Department of Histology and Embryology. China Medical University.
sentences.cn: 组织胚胎学课件. 中国医科大学. 基础医学院. 组胚—英文教学组.

sentences.en: Imaging results were correlated with BMI, detection of sentinel nodes, blue dye detection, and histology.
sentences.cn: 影像的结果与BMI 、 前哨淋巴结的检出 、 蓝色染料的检出和组织学相关.

sentences.en: It is not proposed to deal with the detailed histology of regenerating tissues here.
sentences.cn: 这里未提出详细的再生组织的组织学.

sentences.en: Now, however, traditional teaching methods histology fail to satisfy the requirements of modem medical education.
sentences.cn: 但传统的教学方法已不能很好适应新时期医学教学的发展要求.

sentences.en: Researches about temporomandibular joint focus on basic studies including histology and morphology.
sentences.cn: 有关颞下颌关节(Temporomandibularjoint,TMJ)的研究主要集中在基础性研究(包括组织学变化和形态学改变)方面.

sentences.en: Results this paper reported 40 cases of gallbladder carcinoma all comfirmed by histology, 70 % is adenocarcinoma.
sentences.cn: 结果本文40例胆囊癌的诊断与手术病理或细胞学都符合,病例类型以腺癌最为常见, 占70%.

sentences.en: The histology of the main nerve rings has been described in detail.
sentences.cn: 主要神经环的组织原已有详细描述.

sentences.en: The osteoinduction of the composite was assessed by histology and image analysis system.
sentences.cn: 取材后通过组织学方法和图像分析评价其骨诱导活性.

sentences.en: The relationship between the histology and sonographic findings was analysed.
sentences.cn: 分析其病理结果与超声声像图的关系.

sentences.en: The staining method Golgi discovered was of vital significance; using that method, he laid the foundations of the discipline we now call histology.
sentences.cn: 另外，高尔基染色法也具有重要的意义，正是因为这一方法，他奠定了现代组织学的基础。

sentences.en: With humans, we're somewhat limited.We do this - use this technique called high-resolution MRI, which, by the way, isn't very high resolution compared to histology that we can do with animals.
sentences.cn: 至于人类，我们所能做的稍稍有限，我们使用一种被称为高分辨率核磁共振成像的技术，其实和我们对动物做的组织学检查相比，这个也没多高分辨率。

words.tran_cn: 组织胺酵素，[生化] 组胺酶
